pr_title: Move 390 compiles from ubuntu16 to Redhat7

timeline.message:
Move 390 compiles from ubuntu16 to Redhat7

* [skip ci]
* eclipse/openj9#7791

Signed-off-by: Joe deKoning <joe_dekoning@ca.ibm.com>

timeline.bodyText: Should probably make this specifically sw.os.rhel.7. In the event we add rhel8 for example.
timeline.author: AdamBrousseau
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -193,9 +193,9 @@ s390x_linux:
     8: 'linux-s390x-normal-server-release'
     11: 'linux-s390x-normal-server-release'
   node_labels:
-    build: 'ci.role.build && hw.arch.s390x && sw.os.ubuntu'
+    build: 'ci.role.build && hw.arch.s390x && sw.os.rhel'
